name: True Dark Neo Pieces (chess.com and lichess.org)
description:
Changes both the chess.com and lichess.org piece style to "Neo" except the black pieces are actually the appropriate dark color instead of light grey.

Also swaps the "wood4" board theme with the chess.com "Walnut" theme.
additional_info:
For chess.com: Enable Neo pieces in settings for maximum immersion (thumbnails are only correct when "Neo" is enabled.

For lichess.org: If you don't like the walnut theme and actually use the "wood4" theme, it's one line from the CSS that has to be deleted.
